name: RedEx
description:
Get ready for adventures as a courageous man who longs for revenge on a logistic corporation RedExpress.
You are to fight against mercenaries of an underground smuggling organization, which hides behind the name of RedEX, and to decide the fate of this dirty business forever.

Game features

  • Huge variety of weapons: from a simple pistol to the most powerful sniper rifle
  • Unique mechanic of supplies purchase
  • Flexible controls which don’t let you down in extreme situations
  • Delightful graphics
  • Wide range of enemies with lots of different weapons
  • Location bosses who can give you unique experience spheres, which let you...
  • Character improvements which make him stronger
  • And much more in the Game...
